item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Don’t miss @forrestnorwood, BD, @conduitxyz at Plume Denver!
Join us on Feb 25th for an all-day summit featuring discussions on RWAfi, stablecoins, real yield, and more, and connect with leaders in DeFi advancing the adoption of tokenized assets.

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Posts on Zora are now instantly tradable coins.
+ Each post is a coin with a supply of 1 billion + Creators automatically receive 10 million coins at launch + Creators earn 1% of every trade
Coin it. Trade it. Discover the value of your posts.
item.dc:creator: @zora
item.description:
Posts on Zora are now instantly tradable coins.

+ Each post is a coin with a supply of 1 billion
+ Creators automatically receive 10 million coins at launch
+ Creators earn 1% of every trade

Coin it. Trade it. Discover the value of your posts.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: There’s no easier way to integrate NFTScan than on Conduit Marketplace.
Plug it in and watch your chain instantly get 100x more NFT-friendly. https://www.conduit.xyz/marketplace
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
There’s no easier way to integrate NFTScan than on Conduit Marketplace.

Plug it in and watch your chain instantly get 100x more NFT-friendly. conduit.xyz/marketplace

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Your chain’s NFT data also goes into the NFTScan API. That allows the thousands of developers on the NFTScan platform to query the data and build better NFT experiences on your chain – better wallets, better NFT marketplaces, better SocialFi apps, and more.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Your chain’s NFT data also goes into the NFTScan API. That allows the thousands of developers on the NFTScan platform to query the data and build better NFT experiences on your chain – better wallets, better NFT marketplaces, better SocialFi apps, and more.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: What do you get with NFTScan?
For one, you get a dedicated, public NFT explorer for your chain.
Users can see which collections, marketplaces, and mints are doing the biggest numbers on your rollup.
What better way to build excitement for your chain’s NFT ecosystem?
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
What do you get with NFTScan?

For one, you get a dedicated, public NFT explorer for your chain.

Users can see which collections, marketplaces, and mints are doing the biggest numbers on your rollup.

What better way to build excitement for your chain’s NFT ecosystem?

item.title:
NFTScan is officially on Conduit Marketplace.
Built by the same team behind @Mint_Blockchain, @nftscan_com has the biggest NFT database spanning 20+ blockchains, providing professional and comprehensive NFT data services to web3 users and developers.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: If you want to launch a ZK fraud proof rollup with Conduit or learn how to transition your existing rollup to ZK fraud proofs, contact us here. https://conduitxyz.typeform.com/to/PuJqThqF

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Read our blog here for a full explanation of how ZK fraud proofs work and why we’re so bullish on them. https://www.conduit.xyz/blog/succinct-zk-fraud-proofs/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Read our blog here for a full explanation of how ZK fraud proofs work and why we’re so bullish on them. conduit.xyz/blog/succinct-zk…

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Is ZK the endgame? Of course. But the technology is still new and ZK proving costs are high for some rollups.
ZK fraud proofs are a cheaper, easier first step on the road to full ZK
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Is ZK the endgame? Of course. But the technology is still new and ZK proving costs are high for some rollups.

ZK fraud proofs are a cheaper, easier first step on the road to full ZK

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: How ZK fraud proofs work:
The rollup acts as an optimistic rollup until a challenger disputes.
The proposer then submits a ZK proof defending their claim. The proof is verified in one step, which is faster & more capital-efficient than the standard optimistic dispute process.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
How ZK fraud proofs work:

The rollup acts as an optimistic rollup until a challenger disputes.

The proposer then submits a ZK proof defending their claim. The proof is verified in one step, which is faster & more capital-efficient than the standard optimistic dispute process.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: ZK fraud proofs are an attractive middle ground between optimistic fraud proofs and full ZK validity proofs. Rollups can get:
Faster finality than optimistic (1 day vs 7 days) 20x lower bonds than optimistic Lower ZK proving costs than full ZK
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
ZK fraud proofs are an attractive middle ground between optimistic fraud proofs and full ZK validity proofs. Rollups can get:

Faster finality than optimistic (1 day vs 7 days)
20x lower bonds than optimistic
Lower ZK proving costs than full ZK

item.title:
ZK fraud proofs from @SuccinctLabs are here today, and you can implement them seamlessly with Conduit.
In fact, one Conduit rollup is already working with Succinct as a pilot customer: @Donatuz_ 🎉
More info on why we’re excited about ZK fraud proofs below ⬇️

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: OKX tooling + Your Conduit rollup = 1 killer chain
There’s no easier way to get these essential tools on your rollup than by adding them on Conduit Marketplace.
Check it out here, or in your Conduit app! https://www.conduit.xyz/marketplace
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
OKX tooling + Your Conduit rollup = 1 killer chain

There’s no easier way to get these essential tools on your rollup than by adding them on Conduit Marketplace.

Check it out here, or in your Conduit app! conduit.xyz/marketplace

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: OKX Explorer is a free (!) block explorer tool that makes it easy for users to draw crucial insights from your chain’s activity.
It has all the standard block explorer functionality you know and love, plus:
Zero-cost Explorer-as-a-Service (EaaS) Unmatched coverage of 60+ blockchains Robust OpenAPIs Smart contract verification And more
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
OKX Explorer is a free (!) block explorer tool that makes it easy for users to draw crucial insights from your chain’s activity.

It has all the standard block explorer functionality you know and love, plus:

Zero-cost Explorer-as-a-Service (EaaS)
Unmatched coverage of 60+ blockchains
Robust OpenAPIs
Smart contract verification
And more

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Let’s start with OKX DEX: an all-in-one trading aggregator for multi-chain and cross-chain transactions.
3 core APIs: (1) swap (2) limit order (3) cross-chain Instant access to 400+ DEXs on 20+ chains Built for scalability, handling 900M+ daily calls with an avg response time of 40ms
Give the devs who build on your chain superpowers.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Let’s start with OKX DEX: an all-in-one trading aggregator for multi-chain and cross-chain transactions.

3 core APIs: (1) swap (2) limit order (3) cross-chain
Instant access to 400+ DEXs on 20+ chains
Built for scalability, handling 900M+ daily calls with an avg response time of 40ms

Give the devs who build on your chain superpowers.

item.title:
We’re proud to announce our integration partnership with @okx.
Both OKX Explorer and OKX DEX API are available on Conduit Marketplace.
Two essential tools that can make your rollup better, from one of the best teams in crypto.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
